summary: This fix aims to remove the clipping bug that occurs when wearing an Iron Helmet with the vanilla male 4-braided hairstyle (HairMaleNord04)
descriptionHtml:
It always annoyed me that one of the coolest hairstyles in the game was clipping through the helmet. Since i didn\'t find any fix i looked into it myself and discovered that the hairline-mesh file was the problem, so i replaced it with another hairstyle\'s hairline-mesh.
Since i am probably not allowed to upload the file, here is a short tutorial on how to fix this yourself within 5 minutes.

How to:
-You\'ll need an BSA Archive browser, such as Fallout Mod Manager .
-Check Skyrim-Meshes.BSA and search for \'hair\'.
-find:
meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/male/hairline06.nif
meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/male/hairline06.tri
-extract them and rename them to \'hairline04.nif\' and \'hairline04.tri\'
-drop these files in:
skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/male
-Done

Uninstall:
Remove \'hairline04.nif\' and \'hairline04.tri\' from
skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/male.

Conflict:
This fix will most likely conflict with any mod that alters the vanilla hairstyle-hairlines meshes.

Please do not hesitate to ask if you have questions.
author: Kyuubi no Youko
